scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run css && npm run bundle
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && npm run css && BROWSER=chrome npm run bundle
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && npm run css && BROWSER=firefox npm run bundle
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently -n css,js -c yellow,blue "npm run css:watch" "npm run watch:bundle"
scripts.css: npx @tailwindcss/cli -i src/app.css -o dist-chrome/app.css && npx @tailwindcss/cli -i src/app.css -o dist-firefox/app.css
